component.name: IdentifyResults
component.file: IdentifyResults.swf (compiled component, needed for publication on internet)
IdentifyResults.xml (configurationfile, needed for publication on internet)
component.description: This component shows the response of an identify in a textwindow.

configtag.name: <fmc:IdentifyResults>
<fmc:IdentifyResults>

attribute.name: stripdatabase
stripdatabase
attribute.description: (defaultvalue = "true") true or false. If set to true the fieldname will be stripped until the last '.'

configtag.hierarchy: childnode of <flamingo> or a container component. e.g. <fmc:Window>
configtag.description: This tag defines a window for showing identify results.
